sentences.sContent: Are you in love with him?
Why don’t you ask him yourself?
He repeated what she had told him.
sentences.sCn: 他把她告诉他的话重复了一遍。

sentences.sContent: I knew it was him as soon as I heard his voice.
sentences.sCn: 我一听声音就知道是他。

sentences.sContent: ...and began to test her: he would give her a date and ask her to tell him about the world events on that day...
...Why don't you send an email requesting a meeting with him in private...
...But anyway I'll send him an email to request a meeting...
...it would be better if you approached him directly...
...That's why we chose him for the job...
...much has been said about him as a peerless business leader who has created immense wealth for shareholders...
...his kid greeted him with a downcast face and a sad voice...
...The author's mother taught him a valuable lesson by pointing out lots of flaws in his seemingly perfect essay...
...The criticism the author received from his mother changed him as a person...

trans.tranOther: used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
